name: Blockface
description: Blockface (BLOCK) is a crypto-native social platform that connects users through wallet-based identities and real-time blockchain activity. Built for traders, meme coin enthusiasts, and Web3 communities, Blockface enables users to sign in with their wallets, engage in token-specific feeds, and track live market movements. With customizable feeds and a focus on organic engagement, Blockface aims to redefine how crypto communities interact in the decentralized era.
